prompts.prompt: How many hours and minutes are left until midnight in this time zone?

template.name: how-long-until-midnight
template.description: Calculate time remaining until midnight, given the current time in a specific time zone.

arguments.name: timeZone
arguments.description: The IANA time zone name (e.g., Europe/Amsterdam).

prompts.prompt: Is Daylight Saving Time currently active in this time zone? If yes, what are the DST start and end dates?

template.name: is-dst-active
template.description: Determine if DST is active and, if so, provide DST start/end dates.

arguments.name: timeZone
arguments.description: The IANA time zone name (e.g., Europe/Amsterdam).

prompts.prompt: What is the offset to UTC in hours and minutes for this time zone?

template.name: utc-offset-now
template.description: Extract the UTC offset for the given time zone.

arguments.name: timeZone
arguments.description: The IANA time zone name (e.g., Europe/Amsterdam).

prompts.prompt: What day of the week is this?

template.name: weekday-for-date
template.description: Tell the user what weekday it is for the provided date.

prompts.prompt: How far are we into the year, as a day number (e.g., day 123)?

template.name: day-of-year-for-date
template.description: Calculate the day number within the year for a specific date.

prompts.prompt: What season is it now in this location, based on the date and the hemisphere for this time zone?

template.name: season-now
template.description: Determine the current season (spring, summer, autumn, winter) for a specific time zone.

arguments.name: timeZone
arguments.description: The IANA time zone name (e.g., Europe/Sydney or America/Sao_Paulo).
